articles.title: 'Worst category to do this' - Formula E drivers slam protestors - The Race
articles.description: The so-called ‘Last Generation’ climate activist group is believed to be behind the attempted disruption of the second Berlin E-Prix.
articles.content:
The Last Generation climate activist group is believed to be behind the attempted disruption of the second Berlin E-Prix on Sunday, a protest that has been criticised by a number of drivers.
The gro… [+3345 chars]
